column4: All right I'll ask a question.. desktop xchat works fine but my install on my lappy.. when I hit "X" to close/minimize it asks if I just want to put it on the panel (minimize) and if it should do this all the time for that action.. I choose yes.. yet it doesn't save the option and closes it the next time.. any ideas?
try choosing another metacity theme or emerald
it's clearlooks.. pretty standard but I'll give it a shot on the next boot of the machine.
I've always had issues with emerald for some reason..
you shouldnt
buy a new computer :D
it is new :(.. a vostro 1400 that runs great with ubuntu but the win install keeps blowing up (BSOD) with only 10 uses..
win wont ever be good enough

except access lots of propitiatory sites that use active x that I need.. and a couple of programs specific to my work
